error_details.explanation: Input misrepresentation. The value for 'less_ounces' (2) was used instead of 'servings_per_day' (3).

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 30
A quart is 32 ounces so this jar is 32-2=<<32-2=30>>30 ounces
James uses 2*0.5=<<2*0.5=1>>1 ounces a day
So it last 30/1=<<30/1=30>>30 day
